sentences.english: There's a boy in flared pants and a yellow short-sleeved shirt.
sentences.chinese: 一個男孩穿一條發亮的褲子和黃色短袖衫。

sentences.english: Sometimes a choli would be worn with this.
sentences.chinese: 有時候會連同短袖外套一起穿上。

sentences.english: Purple short-sleeve T-shirts are popular this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年非常流行紫色的短袖衫。

sentences.english: Girls must wear white dresses with the short sleeves, blue belts, white socks and black shoes.
sentences.chinese: 女孩必須穿短袖白裙子，系藍腰帶，穿白襪和黑鞋。

sentences.english: She wore a gray dress with short sleeves.
Women are not allowed into the monastery in short - sleeve shirts.
sentences.chinese: 婦女不能着短袖襯衫進入修道院。

sentences.english: We will provide the students with 4 short sleeve T-shirts.
sentences.chinese: 主辦機構爲學員提供4件訓練用短袖T恤。

sentences.english: There’s a boy in flared pants and a yellow short-sleeved shirt.
sentences.chinese: 有個男孩穿着喇叭褲和黃色短袖衫。

sentences.english: She wore a pink T-shirt with a butterfly design on the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一件肩膀有蝴蝶花紋的粉色短袖。

sentences.english: Yes, for girls there are tight-fitting short-sleeved shirt and low waist miniskirt.
sentences.chinese: 是的，女生們穿緊身短袖襯衫和低腰迷你裙。

sentences.english: Mom: You should. Your T-shirt is all wet.
sentences.chinese: 你是應該洗一下，你的短袖襯衫都全溼了。

sentences.english: George wears a short- sleeved shirt.

sentences.chinese: 你的短袖襯衫都全溼了。

sentences.english: Two, in fact, have just walked in. The pair wear short sleeves and jeans.
sentences.chinese: 兩個穿着短袖和牛仔褲的人剛好走了進來。
